title: Big town (TEFC)
creator_credit: Cyclops Films, Michael Bortman, Eliot Noyes and Claudia Weill
brief_description: Presents five vignettes about life in and around New York City. “Mannequin” - by Michael Bortman - preparation for a mannequin parade. “Marriage” - a city marriage; “Commuters” - early morning commuters; “Yoga” - a yoga group; “Lost and Found” - the little losses that loom large to the people of the big city - by Elliot Noyes, Jr and Claudia Weill.
creator_credit_for_label: Cyclops Films, Michael Bortman, Eliot Noyes and Claudia Weill
